Wisdom: أَقْبَحُ شَيْ‏ءٍ جَوْرُ الْوُلَاةِ
enWisdom: The most loathsome thing is the tyranny of rulers

Wisdom: السُّلْطَانُ الْجَائِرُ وَالْعَالِمُ الْفَاجِرُ أَشَدُّ النَّاسِ نِكَايَةً
enWisdom: A tyrant ruler and an immoral scholar are the most harmful of all people

Wisdom: الْجَائِرُ مَمْقُوتٌ مَذْمُومٌ وَإِنْ لَمْ يَصِلْ مِنْ جَوْرِهِ إِلَى ذَامِّهِ شَيْ‏ءٌ وَالْعَادِلُ ضِدُّ ذَلِكَ
enWisdom: NULL

Wisdom: أَحَقُّ النَّاسِ أَنْ يُحْذَرَ السُّلْطَانُ الْجَائِرُ وَالْعَدُوُّ الْقَادِرُ وَالصَّدِيقُ الْغَادِرُ
enWisdom: The people whom one should be cautious of the most are the tyrannical king, the powerful enemy and the disloyal friend

Wisdom: آفَةُ الْعَدْلِ الظَّالِمُ الْقَادِرُ
enWisdom: The bane of justice is the powerful tyrant

Wisdom: إِذَا فَسَدَ الزَّمَانُ سَادَ اللِّئَامُ
enWisdom: When the epoch becomes corrupt, the wicked gain mastery [over the people]

Wisdom: دَوْلَةُ الْجَاهِلِ كَالْغَرِيبِ الْمُتَحَرِّكِ إِلَى النُّقْلَةِ
enWisdom: The reign of an ignorant person is like a stranger who [soon] moves to another place

Wisdom: دَوْلَةُ الْجَائِرِ مِنَ الْمُمْكِنَات
enWisdom: NULL

Wisdom: دَوْلَةُ الْأَوْغَادِ مَبْنِيَّةٌ عَلَى الْجَوْرِ وَالْفَسَادِ
enWisdom: The sovereignty of scoundrels is founded on oppression and corruption

Wisdom: دُوَلُ اللِّئَامِ مِنْ نَوَائِبِ الْأَيَّامِ
enWisdom: The ascendency the vile ones is from the calamities of the times

Wisdom: زَمَانُ الْجَائِرِ شَرُّ الْأَزْمِنَةِ
enWisdom: The age of the tyrant [ruler] is the worst of ages

Wisdom: سَبُعٌ أَكُولٌ حَطُومٌ خَيْرٌ مِنْ وَالٍ ظَلُومٍ غَشُومٍ
enWisdom: A predatory animal that is rapacious and tears it prey apart is better than an unjust and oppressive ruler

Wisdom: شَرُّ الْمُلُوكِ مَنْ خَالَفَ الْعَدْلَ
enWisdom: The worst of kings is one who opposes justice

Wisdom: شَرُّ الْأُمَرَاءِ مَنْ كَانَ الْهَوَى عَلَيْهِ [عَلَيْهِ الْهَوَى‏] أَمِيراً
enWisdom: The worst of all rulers is one who is ruled by his vain desire

Wisdom: شَرُّ الْأُمَرَاءِ مَنْ ظَلَمَ رَعِيَّتَهُ
enWisdom: The worst of rulers is one whose subjects are oppressed

Wisdom: غَضَبُ الْمُلُوكِ رَسُولُ الْمَوْتِ
enWisdom: The wrath of kings is the messenger of death

Wisdom: فِقْدَانُ الرُّؤَسَاءِ أَهْوَنُ مِنْ رِيَاسَةِ السِّفَلِ
enWisdom: Lack of leaders is easier to bear than the leadership of the depraved

Wisdom: وَيْلٌ لِمَنْ سَاءَتْ سِيرَتُهُ وَجَارَتْ مَلَكَتُهُ وَتَجَبَّرَ وَاعْتَدَى
enWisdom: Woe be to the one whose conduct is evil, whose authority is oppressive, and who tyrannizes and infringes upon the rights [of those who are under him]

Wisdom: وُلَاةُ الْجَوْرِ شِرَارُ الْأُمَّةِ وَأَضْدَادُ الْأَئِمَّةِ
enWisdom: Oppressive governors are the worst of the ummah and opponents of the [true] leaders

Wisdom: لَا جَوْرَ أَفْظَعُ [أَقْطَعُ‏] مِنْ جَوْرِ حَاكِمٍ
enWisdom: There is no oppression more severe than the oppression of a ruler

Wisdom: لَا خَيْرَ فِي حُكْمِ جَائِرٍ
enWisdom: NULL

Wisdom: مُجَامَلَةُ أَعْدَاءِ اللَّهِ فِي دَوْلَتِهِمْ تَقِيَّةٌ [تُقَاةٌ] مِنْ عَذَابِ اللَّهِ وَحَذَرٌ مِنْ مَعَارِكِ الْبَلَاءِ فِي الدُّنْيَا
enWisdom: Acting courteously with the enemies of Allah in their domains is a safeguard from the chastisement of Allah and a caution from the raging tribulations of this world

Wisdom: مُجَاهَدَةُ الْأَعْدَاءِ فِي دَوْلَتِهِمْ وَمُنَاضَلَتُهُمْ مَعَ قُدْرَتِهِمْ تَرْكٌ لِأَمْرِ اللَّهِ وَتَعَرُّضٌ لِبَلَاءِ الدُّنْيَا
enWisdom: Struggling against the enemies in their dominions and fighting against them despite their power is abandoning the command of Allah and exposing oneself to the tribulations of this world

Wisdom: لَئِنْ أَمِرَ الْبَاطِلُ لَقَدِيماً فَعَلَ لَئِنْ قَلَّ الْحَقُّ لَرُبَّمَا وَلَعَلَّ لَقَلَّمَا أَدْبَرَ شَيْ‏ءٌ فَأَقْبَلَ
enWisdom: If falsehood dominates, it has [always] been so in the past, and if truth diminishes, that too has often occurred and may [again] happenIt is seldom that a thing lags behind and remains behind

Wisdom: أَمَارَاتُ الدُّوَلِ إِنْشَاءُ [إِنْسَاءُ] الْحِيَلِ
enWisdom: The signs of alternation of power are the creation of stratagems

Wisdom: مَنْ آثَرَ رِضَى رَبٍّ قَادِرٍ فَلْيَتَكَلَّمْ بِكَلِمَةِ عَدْلٍ عِنْدَ سُلْطَانٍ جَائِرٍ
enWisdom: Whoever prefers the pleasure of the All-Powerful Lord, then let him speak with words of justice in the presence of the tyrannical ruler
